Class Kart

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • Kart
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, Player

    public class Kart
extends GameObject
    Represents the all the karts in the world.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static double ACCELERATION
      Acceleration while the kart is driving, in px/ms^2.
      private Angle angle
      The angle the kart is currently facing.
      private double hazardDuration
      The duration for the hazard effect.
      private static double ROTATE_SPEED
      Rotation speed, in radians per ms.
      private double velocity
      The kart's current velocity (px/ms).

      Get the angle the kart is facing.

      Get the hazard duration of the kart is facing.

    • Field Detail

      • ROTATE_SPEED

        private static final double ROTATE_SPEED
        Rotation speed, in radians per ms.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACCELERATION

        private static final double ACCELERATION
        Acceleration while the kart is driving, in px/ms^2.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • hazardDuration

        private double hazardDuration
        The duration for the hazard effect.

      • angle

        private Angle angle
        The angle the kart is currently facing. Note: This is in neither degrees nor radians -- the Angle class allows angles to be manipulated without worrying about units, and the angle value can be extracted in either degrees or radians.

      • velocity

        private double velocity
        The kart's current velocity (px/ms).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Kart

        public Kart(double start_x,
            double start_y,
            Angle angle,
            java.lang.String imgPath)
     throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Creates a new Player.
        Parameters:
        start_x - The kart's initial X location (pixels).
        start_y - The kart's initial Y location (pixels).
        angle - The kart's initial angle.
        imgPath - The file path of the image.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(double rotate_dir,
                 double move_dir,
                 int delta,
                 World world)
        Update the kart for a frame. Adjusts the kart's angle and velocity based on input, and updates the kart's position. Prevents the kart from entering a blocking tile.
        Parameters:
        rotate_dir - The kart's direction of rotation (-1 for anti-clockwise, 1 for clockwise, or 0).
        move_dir - The kart's movement in the car's axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        world - The world the kart is on (to get friction and blocking).

      • render

        public void render(Camera camera)
        Draw the kart to the screen at the correct place.
        Overrides:
        render in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera to draw relative to.
